bropals.lib.simplegame.gui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.Gui

  • public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
    Groups together GuiGroups. Each GuiGroup will have a name that it is referenced by, given to it when the GuiGroup is added to this Gui.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gui()

      Disables the GuiGroup with the specified key.

      Disables all the GuiGroups in this Gui except for the specified ones.
      void enable(java.lang.String key)
      Enables the GuiGroup with the specified key.
      void enableOnly(java.lang.String... enable)
      Disables all the GuiGroups, and then enables the ones in the enable list.

    • Method Detail

      • addGroup

        public void addGroup(java.lang.String key,
            GuiGroup group)
        Adds a GuiGroup to this Gui.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to give to the group
        group - the group to add to the Gui

      • removeGroup

        public void removeGroup(java.lang.String key)
        Removes the GuiGroup with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the group to remove

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(java.lang.String key,
              boolean enabled)
        Sets the enabled state of the specified GuiGroup
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the group to set the enabled state of
        enabled - the enabled state of the group

      • enable

        public void enable(java.lang.String key)
        Enables the GuiGroup with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the specified GuiGroup

      • disable

        public void disable(java.lang.String key)
        Disables the GuiGroup with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the specified GuiGroup

      • disableAllBut

        public void disableAllBut(java.lang.String... dontDisable)
        Disables all the GuiGroups in this Gui except for the specified ones.
        Parameters:
        dontDisable - the GuiGroups that shouldn't be disabled.

      • enableOnly

        public void enableOnly(java.lang.String... enable)
        Disables all the GuiGroups, and then enables the ones in the enable list.
        Parameters:
        enable - the list of GuiGroups to enable

      • swap

        public void swap(java.lang.String on,
        java.lang.String off)
        Enables one GuiGroup while disabling another.
        Parameters:
        on - the key of the GuiGroup to enable.
        off - the key of the GuiGroup to disable.

      • update

        public void update(int mouseX,
          int mouseY)
        Updates all enabled GuiGroups in this Gui
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the current X mouse position
        mouseY - the current Y mouse position

      • render

        public void render(java.lang.Object graphicsObject)
        Draws all enabled GuiGroups in this Gui
        Parameters:
        graphicsObject - the graphics object to draw the GuiGroups with

      • mouseInput

        public void mouseInput(int mouseX,
              int mouseY)
        Sends mouse pressed input to all enabled GuiGroups in this Gui
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the X mouse position
        mouseY - the Y mouse position
